content.prompt: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of the two authors’ views of the “rights of man”?

choices.label: Both Burke and Robespierre support the concept of equal rights.
Both Burke and Robespierre are opposed to the concept of equal rights.
Burke is skeptical of the concept, while Robespierre claims to support them.
Burke claims to support them, while Robespierre is skeptical of the concept.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
